scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && export VERSION=$(bash -c 'git describe --tags --abbrev=0 | cut -c 2-') && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --version-label v$VERSION --studio $SUBGRAPH__MAINNET'
scripts.deploy:gnosis-chain: yarn prepare:gnosis-chain && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ $HOSTED_SERVICE_SUBGRAPH__GNOSIS_CHAIN'
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && export VERSION=$(bash -c 'git describe --tags --abbrev=0 | cut -c 2-') && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --version-label v$VERSION --studio $SUBGRAPH__RINKEBY'
